public class BasicPDecider
extends java.lang.Object

Simple PDecider implementation. Compatible with the BasicGenius.

ondra

Method Detail

findSource

private IveObject findSource(java.util.List<IveObject> sources,
                             java.lang.String role,
                             java.lang.String goalId,
                             java.lang.String processId)
Tries to find a source from the give list which has a link to the given role, goal and process. If one is find, it's returned.

Parameters:
sources - List of sources to search in
role - Role of the object which is looked for in the link
goalId - Id of the goal in the wanted link
processId - Id of the process in the wanted link
Returns:
found Source or null if there's no object with a link of given properties

fillSubstitution

public boolean fillSubstitution(Substitution substitution,
                                java.lang.String goalId,
                                java.lang.String processId,
                                java.util.List<IveObject> sources,
                                Substitution goalSources)
Tries to fill each slot of the given substitution with 1. goal source 2. genius source 3. an object found via the manager of senses

Parameters:
substitution - substitution of the process to fill.
goalId - Id of the goal for which we are filling the subst.
processId - Id of the process for which we are filling the subst.
sources - VIP sources (usually actors)
goalSources - substitution of the goal (rule).
Returns:
did we fill all the necessary sources?

testProcess

public short testProcess(Goal goal,
                         java.util.List<IveObject> sources,
                         ProcessTemplate templateCandidate)
Tests the process suitability (first fills its substitution of course). If the suitability value is more than the current maximum, the process is a new candidate to be chosen to fulfill the goal.

Parameters:
templateCandidate - ProcessTemplate of the process to be tested

chooseProcess

public Pair<ProcessTemplate,Substitution> chooseProcess(Goal goal,
                                                        java.util.List<IveObject> sources,
                                                        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> skipSet,
                                                        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> preferSet)
This method chooses approprite process for throws given goal. This implementation calls p-suitability of all the processes which implement this goal. The one with the best result is chosen

Parameters:
goal - For which to seek the implementation.
sources - VIP sources that can be assigned as needed.
skipSet - set of processes that should not be used.
preferSet - set of processes that should be prefered.
Returns:
The chosen process template and substitution or null if no appropriate process (not in skipList) exists.

setSensors

public void setSensors(java.util.List<Sensor> sensors)
Sets sensors available for making (P)decision.

Parameters:
sensors -
